column4: Hi. I'm using Ubuntu 10.10. Quite often, w/o any signs "metacity" hangs consuming 99% of CPU. It seems to ignore kill commands from then. Problem makes me have to restart whole PC. Here x-error log: http://paste.ubuntuusers.de/403832/ . Has anybody a clue whats wrong?
did you try using kill -9 or killall -9 instead of just the plain kill?
srry don't remember exactly what kill command i used. The problem for me is more that it happens quite often. So even if I could kill metacity in some way, I would have to restart whole x-session.
haven't noticed it happening to me recently - have you tried using the Ubuntu2D session instead?
no just standart mode. I guess I can choose this mode in login screen?
^ see above - sorry, forgot to put your name in the message :(
thx I'll try this next time. If it doesn't happen then for several hours, do you know anything that might be wrong with metacity?
